resources.string: Bold, aromatic, and made for leaders. The CEO Latté combines our signature strong brew with a smooth finish — designed to boost your drive with every sip.
Treat yourself to a rich, buttery infusion paired with smooth espresso and velvety milk, finished with a sweet buttercrème swirl. Ideal for those who savor comfort in every cup.
A sweet, creamy blend where bold espresso meets a trio of rich milks. This smooth classic delivers a warm, full-bodied flavor that’s hard to resist.
Taste the tropics with our iced Gula Melaka latté — a fusion of deep muscovado-style syrup and subtle coconut notes. Refreshing and uniquely satisfying.
A sweet-savory twist combining rich brown sugar and Gula Melaka syrup with a hint of sea salt cream, topped off with espresso for a bold yet smooth finish.
Dive into creamy indulgence with our Australian Chocolate blend — a harmonious mix of rich cocoa and smooth milk for a perfectly balanced chocolate treat.
A sweet-and-salty delight with a velvety caramel flavor and just the right hint of salt. Blended to icy perfection for fans of a timeless favorite.
Chill with this refreshing frappé, made from authentic Japanese Matcha and crowned with a swirl of whipped cream — an energizing green tea escape.
